doc:
Paula Strasberg https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paula_Strasberg 0 Paula Strasberg (March 8, 1909 – April 29, 1966) was a former stage actress who became actor and teacher Lee Strasberg's second wife and mother of actors John and Susan Strasberg, as well as Marilyn Monroe's acting coach and confidante. Paula_Strasberg ( March_8_,_1909 – April_29_,_1966 ) was a_former_stage_actress who became actor_and_teacher_Lee_Strasberg 's_second_wife_and_mother of actors_John_and_Susan_Strasberg , as_well_as Marilyn_Monroe 's_acting_coach_and_confidante .
